function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of capacity regulations in educational buildings during covid-19 alert levels, potentially leading to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of partition walls between parking bays allows for easy adaptation of large car parking areas into smaller educational spaces, potentially leading to overcrowding and congestion.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation in academic buildings a, b, c, and workshop building d increases the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate interior finishing materials and lack of special installations in the car parking building may lead to poor hygiene conditions, increasing the risk of surface contamination and disease spread.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space allocation for students and vehicles leading to overcrowding and congestion.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Congested academic and administrative buildings may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity and high occupancy.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate parking facilities and overhanging structures may lead to congestion and close contact among vehicle occupants, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate workshop facilities and limited space may impact the ability to implement proper hygiene and distancing measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in parking facilities","category":"Poor access to exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective safety and security measures in car parking buildings","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of secondary research approach from multiple countries increases the risk of introducing infectious disease-related guidelines or standards from of quarantine period","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay or prevention of timely healthcare access due to technical solutions.","category":"Lack of
